import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams,Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const DetailView = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('product-1'); const [watch, setWatch] = useState(null); const [watcheimage, setWatchesImage] = useState([]); const { id } = useParams(); console.log('id is'+id) const handleTabChange = (tabId) => { setActiveTab(tabId); }; useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watches/${id}/`) .then(response => { console.log(response.data) setWatch(response.data); console.log(watch) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); fetchWatchesImage(); }, [id]); const fetchWatchesImage = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('http://127.0.0.1:8000/dashboard/watch/image'); setWatchesImage(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching watches:', error); } }; return (

Watch {watch && watch.watch_name}

{/* Product Images */}
{/* Product Image Tabs */}
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{/* Tab Link 1 */} handleTabChange('product-1')} role="tab" aria-selected={activeTab === 'product-1'}> {/* Tab Link 2 */} handleTabChange('product-2')} role="tab" aria-selected={activeTab === 'product-2'}> handleTabChange('product-3')} role="tab" aria-selected={activeTab === 'product-2'}>
{/* Tab Content */}
{/* Inside the tab-content div */}
{/* Tab Pane 1 */}
{/* Tab Pane 2 */}
{/* Tab Pane 3 */}
{/* Buttons */}
View Watch Images
{/* Product Details */}
{/* Product Image Tabs */}
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{watches.map((watch, index) => ( handleTabChange(`product-${index + 1}`)} role="tab" aria-selected={activeTab === `product-${index + 1}`}> ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{/* Inside the tab-content div */}
{/* Tab Pane 1 */}
{/* Tab Pane 2 */}
{/* Tab Pane 3 */}
{/* Buttons */}
View Watch Images
{/* Product Details */}
{watch && watch.brands}

{watch && watch.watch_name}

{watch && watch.discount} % Off
Price : ${watch && watch.price} ${watch && watch.actual_price}

{watch && watch.watch_details}

{/* end row */}
Specifications :
Brand {watch && watch.brands}
Gender {watch && watch.gender}
Dial Type {watch && watch.dial_type}
Dial Colour {watch && watch.dial_colour}
Dial Shape {watch && watch.dial_shape}
Style {watch && watch.style}
Strap Material {watch && watch.strap_material}
{/* end card */}
© React Dashboard.
Design & Develop by Sarfas
); }; export default DetailView;
